channel.title: DeltaScape help, read please
channel.description:
Okay, instead of making one topic per question. I will add them all in here.
First - FIXED Second - Lunar interface, I really need help with that. Because each time I switch to Lunar spells client freezes and I need to log on again. Third -FIXED Please, reply. You can also send link to any Tutorial for any of this, thanks.
- Extoz
NOTE: [u][b]I'm using both DeltaScape client V16 and DeltaScape source[/b][/u]
EDIT: [u][b]I've already used the search button! NO RESULTS OF SEARCHING![/b][/u]

item.title: DeltaScape help, read please
item.dc:creator: @Who_Tank Who Tank
item.description:
@Who_Tank wrote:

Your problem is your client does not have the proper Sprites(images) to go to the proper place, so when it goes to find those sprites it causes an error and you freeze. I don’t have an open source client for you, but you can most likely find one. (:

Read full topic

item.title: DeltaScape help, read please
item.dc:creator: @my_stoof my stoof
item.description:
@my_stoof wrote:

dude deltascape v16 client doesnt support lunar… thats why[quote=“Extoz, post:3, topic:240114”]2. Yeah, maybe you are right, got any idea how to fix that?

  1. Why should I log on via Silab? Does not make sence, it’s about SOURCE not the CLIENT. I need the case number and that should be displayed in run.bat? EDIT: Nope. Cannot find that case either… Maybe it’s not in client.java?[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: DeltaScape help, read please
item.dc:creator: @Extoz Extoz
item.description:
@Extoz wrote:

GodsChaos, thanks alot. Been looking for ages, finally got someone that could help me!
Would rep++ if I could.

Read full topic

item.title: DeltaScape help, read please
item.dc:creator: @GodsChaos GodsChaos
item.description:
@GodsChaos wrote:

the deltascape v16 client doesn’t support lunar; ill post a dl link for the client i use for my server, it supports lunar.

DL link: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=L33DGBWV

Read full topic

item.title: DeltaScape help, read please
item.dc:creator: @TheMyth TheMyth
item.description:
@TheMyth wrote:

[quote=“Extoz, post:1, topic:240114”]Okay, instead of making one topic per question. I will add them all in here.

First - FIXED
Second - Lunar interface, I really need help with that. Because each time I switch to Lunar spells client freezes and I need to log on again.
Third -FIXED
Please, reply. You can also send link to any Tutorial for any of this, thanks.

  • Extoz

NOTE: I’m using both DeltaScape client V16 and DeltaScape source

EDIT: I’ve already used the search button! NO RESULTS OF SEARCHING![/quote]
delta client v16 doesnt have lunar interface, your client client cant find the interface so it just dc’s you.

Read full topic

item.title: DeltaScape help, read please
item.dc:creator: @gunz4life gunz4life
item.description:
@gunz4life wrote:

[quote=“Extoz, post:3, topic:240114”]2. Yeah, maybe you are right, got any idea how to fix that?

  1. Why should I log on via Silab? Does not make sence, it’s about SOURCE not the CLIENT. I need the case number and that should be displayed in run.bat? EDIT: Nope. Cannot find that case either… Maybe it’s not in client.java?[/quote]
    your wrong… its not about the source its the client… because that client doesnt have the lunar interface so its gonna freeze up…

Read full topic

item.title: DeltaScape help, read please
item.dc:creator: @Extoz Extoz
item.description:
@Extoz wrote:

  1. Okay… It worked. THANKS ALOT ON THIS ONE TOO!

  2. It’s DeltaScape client V16, so it should work.

  3. THANKS ALOT!!!

Would rep++ if i could.

Read full topic

item.title: DeltaScape help, read please
item.dc:creator: @magep00ner12 magep00ner12
item.description:
@magep00ner12 wrote:

  1. Search for // If killed apply dead
    then under ResetAttack(); add:

client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId]; youdied(); killerz.sM("You have defeated "+playerName+" ††");

  1. This isn’t an anti leech. You just need a client wich already has the lunar interface.

  2. Texthandler.java for the names and to change where it teles to go to clickingmost.java
    Then search for case 50245: // edgeville teleport
    You can change the teles there

Read full topic

item.title: DeltaScape help, read please
item.dc:creator: @santaher0 santaher0
item.description:
@santaher0 wrote:

if you can’t fix the anti-leech by yourself you can better download the version where it is deleted already

item.title: DeltaScape help, read please

item.description:
@matthew_javier wrote:

Don’t do Silab, the cases are different on there than on your server.

item.title: DeltaScape help, read please
item.dc:creator: @MoparScaperDude MoparScaperDude
item.description:
@MoparScaperDude wrote:

  1. Not sure.

  2. Probably has an anti-leech

  3. Log on via SilabSoft, and goto the tab you want to find the case ID of, hover the mouse over the tab, and look in the top left corner.

Read full topic
